text: Inna Allaha La Yastahyi 'An Yariba Mathalaan Ma Ba`uatan Fama Fawqaha Fa'amma Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Faya`lamuna 'Annahu Al-Haqqu Min Rabbihim Wa 'Amma Al-Ladhina Kafaru Fayaquluna Madha 'Arada Allahu Bihadha Mathalaan Yuillu Bihi Kathiraan Wa Yahdi Bihi Kathiraan Wa Ma Yuillu Bihi 'Illa Al-Fasiqina
